about_the_game:
Game Overview

Long Description:

A sweet and mysterious nurturing adventure with a girl born from an egg!

"My Cute Egg Diary" is a game where the protagonist, who stumbles upon a mysterious egg one day, nurtures the pure and innocent heroine, Chihiro Saotome.

A story that begins with an egg

When the mysterious egg hatches, a curious and naive girl named Chihiro appears before you.
Through meals, play, and care, she slowly opens up her heart.
Watching her bloom will bring smiles and sometimes heart-pounding moments!
And why was she born? A little secret lies behind her existence…

A blend of nurturing and story

Chihiro’s personality and actions change based on your choices and her affection level.
Special events occur, and new scenes unlock as she grows.
As she matures, the secrets of the story and the bond between you deepen, leading to unexpected endings…

Dress-up & H Commands Unlock

Once Chihiro’s “Charm” reaches a certain level, the Dress-up feature unlocks, allowing you to give her new outfits.
As her affection grows, H Commands gradually open up, bringing you two closer together!
From holding hands to kissing to even more intimate moments, the sweetness never ends.

Bright and fun daily events
From heartwarming comedy to lucky pervert moments, life with Chihiro is full of laughter and excitement.
With branching storylines, there’s always something new to discover!

◆Adorable visuals & Spine animations
Chihiro’s lively character art and event CGs exude charm and a delightful comedic vibe.
H Command scenes feature Spine animations, delivering even sweeter and more lifelike moments!

◆Recommended For

  • Fans of sweet romance and wholesome love stories

  • Players who enjoy nurturing games and watching characters grow

  • Those seeking a cozy story with an adorable heroine

  • Anyone looking for quick, engaging gameplay with sweet H-scenes

◆Multilingual Support
The game is available in Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, and Korean, with optimized translations for international players.

◆Demo Available
A demo offering about 30 minutes of gameplay is available now. Experience your first meeting with Chihiro!
Dive into this uniquely sweet story that begins with an egg, just for the two of you.

◆Regarding Mosaic Censorship

This game includes mosaic censorship in accordance with Japanese laws and regulations, considering distribution in Japan. Thank you for your understanding.

content_descriptors.notes:
(My Cute Egg Diary) is a simulation game that includes adult-oriented content. Below are the details about the content included:

・All characters in the game are 20 years or older. This ensures compliance with all legal and ethical standards.

・Sexual depictions: The game includes consensual and soft sexual scenes that occur as the player's relationship with the heroine deepens. Partial nudity is present in certain scenarios.

・Comedic and soft erotic content: The game avoids any depiction of violence or forced actions. All adult content is tied to the progression of the relationship with the heroine.

・Sexual expressions in in-game events: Events such as accidental wardrobe malfunctions and light physical interactions naturally occur as part of the heroine's development.

・There are no depictions of sexual violence, drug or alcohol abuse, self-harm, or other potentially offensive content in the game.

name: My Cute Egg Diary

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
  • Graphics: OpenGL VRAM 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "My Cute Egg Diary" is a sweet romance adventure where you nurture the pure-hearted heroine, Chihiro Saotome, born from a mysterious egg. From holding hands to intense love scenes portrayed with Spine animation, enjoy heartwarming moments and a captivating story!
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
